text:
[Verse]
Starlit skies above so high
Dreams that float just like a sigh
Whispers soft in moonlit night
Shining bright a million lights

[Verse 2]
Walking paths with silent steps
Counting stars with no regrets
Heartbeats echo in the dark
Wishing on a falling spark

[Chorus]
Oh starlit dreams where do you go
In the night you softly glow
Hold me close don't let me fall
In your magic I feel small

[Verse 3]
Dancing shadows on the ground
Mystic tunes without a sound
Every moment feels so true
Underneath the endless blue

[Bridge]
Wish upon a comet's tail
All our dreams they never fail
In the calm let's lose our way
Night and stars they're here to stay

[Chorus]
Oh starlit dreams where do you go
In the night you softly glow
Hold me close don't let me fall
In your magic I feel small
title: Starlit Dreams
